item.title: The Best Flower Delivery Services of 2026, Tested and Reviewed

item.title: These 10 Automatic Cat Feeders Were the Best We Tested (2026)
item.description: We tested some of the most popular automatic dry- and wet-food pet feeders to see which ones are worth the money.

item.title: Trump’s critical mineral reserve is an admission that the future is electric

item.title: Data breach at govtech giant Conduent balloons, affecting millions more Americans

item.title: What Is Thread? Matter’s Smart Home Network Protocol, Explained
item.description: Thread is a mesh networking protocol that connects low-power smart home gadgets, and it’s one of Matter’s underlying technologies.

item.title: Motorola Moto Watch Review: Polar-Powered
item.description: Motorola partnered with Polar to make an Android smartwatch that delivers improved fitness stats.

item.title: Substack confirms data breach affects users’ email addresses and phone numbers
item.description: Substack said that customer data was accessed in October 2025, but wasn't discovered until early February.
